name: Prevent Invasion
description:
Description

Ship game in which you have to destroy all enemy ships to prevent invasion.

Controls

Q: Up

A: Down

Space: Shot

Esc: Back to Menu (only when you die or complete the game)

Sprites

                         

          Ship                                       Alien Ship                             

                                 

      Kamikaze                                    Final Boss                                                                   

Reference to Larcena's Legacy

In the last level, the final enemy will shoot bricks to you as the main character of Larcena's Legacy to the promoter (screenshot_preventinvasion4.PNG). 

               

  Brick                 

Author
